abstract: South Korea beats Iraq, 2-0, qualifying for Asian Cup final; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: South Korea defeated Iraq, 2-0, to qualify for its first Asian Cup final since 1988. The team is one victory from its first Asian Cup title since 1960.
snippet: South Korea defeated Iraq, 2-0, to qualify for its first Asian Cup final since 1988. The team is one victory from its first Asian Cup title since 1960.

headline.main: South Korea Reaches Asian Cup Final
